original: Lindblad, Erik Göran Leopold, sekreterare, Växjö, f. 23/11/92 i Bjuv, Malmöh. 1., av bergsing. Robert L. o. Agnes Bergström. G. 18 m. Gerda Malmberg. Barn: Robert f. 19, Sven 20, Karin 22. — Agronomex. v. Alnarp 13, fil. kand. i Lund 16, lantbr:stud. i Tyskl. o. Schweiz 22, i Engl. o. Wales 31. Lär. v. Rösiös lantbr:sk. 15-16, förste lär. o. förest, v. Värmil. 1. lant-m:sk. i Älgå 16-19, förest, f. Sv:es allm. lantbr :säl.lsk. upphävd. 20-24, sekr. i Kronob. I. hush :säHsk. sed. 25. Ordf. i eckles. boställsndn, allm. lokala vär-der :ndn i Kronob. 1. Skr.: Lärobok i räkning o. geom. f. sk. o. självstud. (tills. m. E. Ernest 16, 6. uppl. 44), Betalningssätt f. lantbr:arb. (24), Dagb. f. lantbr :elever (tills. tn. L. Nanneson 26), upps. i lantbr :frågor i Lantmannen m. fl. facktidskr. samt i dagspressen. RVO 37, GM 42.
translated: Lindblad, Erik Göran Leopold, secretary, Växjö, b. 23/11/92 in Bjuv, Malmöhus County. 1st child of surveyor Robert L. and Agnes Bergström. Married 18 to Gerda Malmberg. Children: Robert b. 19, Sven b. 20, Karin b. 22. — Agricultural expert at Alnarp 13, Bachelor of Arts at Lund University 16, studied agriculture in Germany and Switzerland 22, in England and Wales 31. Teacher at Rösiö Agricultural School 15-16, headteacher and director at Värmil 1st Agricultural School in Älgå 16-19, director of the Swedish General Agricultural Society 20-24, secretary at Kronoberg County Housekeeping Society since 25. Chairman of the Eckles Tenant Farmers' Association, chairman of the local assessment committee in Kronoberg County. Writings: Textbook in accounting and geometry for school and self-study (together with E. Ernest 16, 6th edition 44), Payment methods for agricultural workers (24), Diary for agricultural students (together with L. Nanneson 26), essays on agricultural matters in Lantmannen and other professional journals, as well as in the daily press. Receipent of the Order of the Sword 37, Golden Medal (for merit) 42.

publication.name: Lärobok i räkning o. geom. f. sk. o. självstud.
publication.author: Erik Göran Leopold Lindblad, E. Ernest

publication.name: Dagb. f. lantbr :elever
publication.author: Erik Göran Leopold Lindblad, L. Nanneson
